title: FS: Unusual T206 Hal Chase Portrait (Sale Pending)

posts.post_title: FS: Unusual T206 Hal Chase Portrait (Sale Pending)
posts.post_content: This portrait of Chase shows a slight double Piedmont imprint on back. If graded, I would estimate it would earn a PSA 6-7 MC. Asking $150, PayPal preferred. SALE PENDING
